Uses of Package
sigma.utils

  • Packages that use sigma.utils 
    Package Description
    sigma.trading.news  
    sigma.utils
    Provides utility functions such as logging for portfolio optimization code.
  • Classes in sigma.utils used by sigma.trading.news 
    Class and Description
    OptSide
    Simple enum to implement option sides (CALL/PUT)
    Ticker 
    Trade
    Class to contain trade data
    TraderState
    Possible states of trader algorithm WAIT - no live orders, waiting for trigger LIVE - orders are live, nothing has executed EXEC - post execution stage with at least one order executed, some cancelled and some live (like trail stop)
  • Classes in sigma.utils used by sigma.utils 
    Class and Description
    LogLevel
    Generic error levels for logging stuff.
